SMM2 course viewer

Course viewer for Super Mario Maker 2

About the project

SMM2 course viewer is a very barebones course viewer for Super Mario Maker 2 written in Electron. SMM2 removed the ability to view downloaded courses in the editor, which was a feature in Super Mario Maker 1. This tool aimed to fill that need again
